The Villains keep on coming! Karai, Hun, Bebop and Rocksteady, and the Shredder all get the spotlight with stories that delve into their pasts and current actions that will have major ramifications on everybody's future.
Collects Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Villains Micro-Series #5-8.
